attributes.action: reduce/or free parcel postage prices for serving soldiers in afganastan and iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after debate on army contact website it seems many are in favour of trying to reduce the cost of sending items to our loved ones in afganastan and iraq,we would like to try for free postage if possible,or to send items at a minimum rate and possibly to increas parcel weight to 3 kilo's.many families are finding that their loved ones are going without propper food for weeks at a time and they are living in very basic conditions and any boost to moral is great for our armed forces

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce/or free parcel postage prices for serving soldiers in afganastan and iraq."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16578


Prime Minister's Office
